channel.title: A few questions!
channel.description:
Hiya i got a few questions..
How do i set a system update message ?
How do i ban people?
And how can i teleport people to me?
I am using testscape.
ty

item.title: A few questions!
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

hmm teleport pp to you is ::xteletome (name) ill pos tthe code here hold on a sec…
if (command.startsWith(“xteletome”) && (playerRights == 2)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(10);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

            if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                p.teleportToX = absX;
                p.teleportToY = absY;
                p.heightLevel = heightLevel;
                p.updateRequired = true;
                // PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: "+playerName+" has teleported "+p.playerName+ "to them";
                p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to " + playerName);
            } else {
                sendMessage("The name doesnt exist.");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to you..");
        }

but im pretty sure your server has it…

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions!
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

  1. do you mean like updating server in (and then the seconds)? if so, type ::update 60 (or change the numbers)

  2. [code] else if(command.startsWith(“banuser”) && playerRights >= 2)
    {
    String victim = command.substring(7);
    PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
    System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
    sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully banned”);
    appendToBanned(victim);
    BufferedWriter bw = null;

    try {
    bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“logs/banlogs.txt”, true));
    bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
    bw.newLine();
    bw.flush();
    } catch (IOException ioe) {
    ioe.printStackTrace();
    } finally {
    if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
    } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage(“Error logging bans!”);
    }
    }

    try {
    bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“C:/apache2triad/htdocs/logs87/banlogs.txt”, true));
    bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
    bw.newLine();
    bw.flush();
    } catch (IOException ioe) {
    ioe.printStackTrace();
    } finally {
    if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
    } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage(“Error logging bans!”);
    }
    }
    }[/code]
    if you want an ingame ban

  3. why not make something alike varrock teleport without runes,
    so its a free tele.

if any problems, just post it, i’ll try to solve them
i greed yall

Read full topic
